subject: Re: [nihontostudy]
msgSnippet: Bob, Unfortunately, no-one has any luck with him. Your friend got off lightly, he takes the shipwreck divers and archivers for $1000 s at a time. I have passed
messageBody:
Bob,

Unfortunately, no-one has any luck with him. Your friend got off
lightly, he takes the shipwreck divers and archivers for $1000's at a
time.
I have passed on your friends' basic info to my guy in Poland who is
working with the police and the newspapers on this. Maybe something
happens..maybe not.
Beware of Pawel..he works in a syndicate I think, and has drivers
licence info, more pics..all the things we ask for for proof.

Brian

--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, Bob Elder <toyama1_2000@...> wrote:
>
> Thanks. A guy I know just got hosed for 235.00 for
> the katana and a Masa Hide tanto. Sent him half
> payment. Anyone had any luck with this dude? Bob Elder
>
